text: deva grantha himiyani, numbala tavrataya da injilaya da numbalage paramadhipatigen numbala veta pahala karanu læbu dæ da kriyavata namvana tek numbala kisivak mata ( pihita) nomæta yæyi (nabivaraya,) numba pavasanu. tavada numbage paramadhipatigen numba veta pahala karanu læbu dæ ovungen bahutarayakage simava ikmava yæma ha pratiksepaya vardhanaya kaleya. ebævin deva pratiksepita janaya kerehi numba duk novanu
